definition: Asahi (Japanese place name, company name etc)
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: This is the "Asahi Shimbun" reported 29 headlines.
sentences.chinese: 這是《朝日新聞》29日頭版頭條報道的。

sentences.english: I'm entertained by Cedric Tiberghien Piano Recital at Hamarikyu Asahi Hall.
sentences.chinese: 我很欣賞鋼琴獨奏會在濱離宮朝日堂。

sentences.english: And both the United States and Europe are well on their way toward Japan-style deflationary traps.
sentences.chinese: 同時，美國和歐洲正在朝日式的通貨緊縮陷阱走去。

sentences.english: Asahi’s Beer Pouring Robot is here to help!
sentences.chinese: 朝日啤酒斟酒機器人來幫你。

sentences.english: Emperors in Qing Dynasty always wore court beads that were made from red coral in Asahi etiquettes .
sentences.chinese: 清代皇帝在行朝日禮儀中，經常戴紅珊瑚製成的朝珠。

sentences.english: Nishimura & Asahi is one of Japan's so-called Big Four law firms.
sentences.chinese: 西村朝日法律事務所是日本所謂四大律所之一。

sentences.english: The first Asahi House beer hall opens for business.
sentences.chinese: 第一家朝日啤酒屋大堂開幕營業。

definition: Sendai, capital of Miyagi prefecture 宮城縣|宫城县[Gong1 cheng2 xian4] in northeast Japan
